snippet: At Polygon Elite, Sergei Maslikhov teaches the millennium-old Systema Rukopashnii Boi, a type of hand-to-hand combat that stresses survival over elegance.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Polygon Elite, Flatiron district martial arts studio where master Sergei Maslikhov teaches students brutal Russian defense technique Systema, form of hand-to-hand combat.
lead_paragraph: At Polygon Elite, Sergei Maslikhov teaches the millennium-old Systema Rukopashnii Boi, a type of hand-to-hand combat that stresses survival over elegance.

headline.main: Teaching a Medieval Russian Martial Art in a Flatiron Basement
